ns.title: Full stack Developer
ns.description: Building and setting up the ns flex webshop, Tools Angular, Typescript, rxjs, java Spring boot

personal.name: Jonathan Oudshoorn
personal.info_text: I am a software engineer with great passion for computers and especially for software developing. As a full stack developer, I am always keen to explore and learn new technologies. I have over 7 years of experience working for different clients within agile working teams. As a software engineer I am also very keen on getting involved and thinking together with the clients on how to best achieve their goals and how best to serve their customers. I have spent my school and education years in Israel where I successfully finished my bachelor in Computer Science. Shortly after getting my degree, I moved to the Netherlands where I currently live with my girlfriend and two cats.
